title: Hypermedia-Based Self-Regulated Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in the field of science
context.additional_context: A short-term course for current science practitioners to acquire self-regulated learning strategies in a mobile environment using personal devices (BYOD), with metacognitive support via a multi-agent tutoring system.

learning_goals: Learners can execute at least three self-regulated learning strategies in hypermedia environments using a multi-agent tutoring system
Learners can reconstruct core concepts based on domain knowledge and apply them to project outputs with over 80% accuracy
Learners can diagnose their learning patterns and establish improvement plans by analyzing system log data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
